version_description:
Entirely New Application
Intuitive and Elegant User Interface
Many New Features
Bug Fixes

• Qibla Direction: Automated location option is now available with improved UI.
• Splash Screen: New Animated Splash screen has been added in the Application.
• Updated User Interface.
• Bug Fixes.
Add New User Interface,Extra Cites,Madani Radio, Azkar,3d touch.

We Update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available features and improvements. Thanks for using Prayers Times.
1)Fix Content Issues.
2)Fix Azaan Issues.
3)Fix Notification.

We Update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available features and improvements. Thanks for using Prayers Times.
1)Fix Notification.

Location feature enhanced : When you get your latitude and longitude firstly we check these values are available in our own database or not if available then show the location from database if not available then we call the google api's.
